name: qa_cypress_e2e_simple_auth
description: 1. Fork the repo. 1. Clone **your** forked repository. 1. Run the command `npm i`. 1. Create a new branch `git checkout -b testing`. 1. Resolve tasks in the `cypress`/`e2e`/`signIn.cy.js`. 1. Check yourself before submitting the task with a [Cypress checklist](https://mate-academy.github.io/qa-program/checklists/cypress.html). 1. Create a pull request. 1. Do not forget to click on `Re-request review` if you submit the homework after previous review.
